comment: Not bad. Some heat at first but easily tempered with water. Pretty color like extra filtered honey. Nose brings nice notes. Some spice. Kinda like a cinnamon followed with vanilla. Mouth feel is full and then ends. Nothing special here. Would a get it again, probably not. But it’s not terrible. Just have had better
Super light, strong smell but light body.

Enjoyed this immensely, a spirit that does all the right things. The flavor of apple and light hops makes you want another sip. NO need for water, you will want to savor this drinks full expression. Absolutely worth seeking out. Davidson's W&S in SF 99$
